comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See them boxing in flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2458993609/ and flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2459829190/ According to www.archive.org/details/vaudevillefromth013372mbp [Vaudeville From The Honky Tonks To The Palace (1953) by Joe Laurie, Jr.] they were a vaudeville act and did boxing, fencing, and wrestling.
